TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIAccessibilityPostNotification extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Notification types for UIAccessibility's PostNotification method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIAccessibilityPostNotification Announcement = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Inform the accessibility system that an announcement must be made to the user, use an NSString argument for this notification.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIAccessibilityPostNotification LayoutChanged = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Inform the accessibility system that new UI elements have been added or removed from the screen, use an NSString argument with the information to convey the details.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIAccessibilityPostNotification PageScrolled = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Inform the accessibility system that scrolling has completed, use an NSString argument to pass the information to be conveyed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIAccessibilityPostNotification ScreenChanged = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Inform the accessibility system that a major change to the user interface has taken place (essentially, a new screen is visible), use an NSString argument to convey the details.
